text: {| class="toccolours" style="float: right; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; width: 21em; font-size: 90%; clear: right;" cellspacing="5" |- |+ style="text-align: center; font-size: larger; margin-left: inherit;" | Japanese-Lithuanian Hieroglyphs Dictionary |- |- style="vertical-align: top;" | Original Title (Lithuanian) | Japonų-lietuvių kalbų hieroglifų žodynas |- style="vertical- align: top;" | Author(s) | Dalia Švambarytė |- style="vertical-align: top;" | Genre | Dictionary |- | colspan="2" style="text-align: center; font-size: larger;" | Data |- style="vertical-align: top;" |Released | 2002 |- style="vertical-align: top;" | Publisher | Alma Littera |- style="vertical- align: top;" |Pages | 792 |- style="vertical-align: top;" |ISBN | |} Japanese- Lithuanian Hieroglyphs Dictionary (, ) is the Japanese-Lithuanian dictionary. It is the only Japanese–Lithuanian dictionary that has been published in Lithuania. Author – hab. dr. Dalia Švambarytė. In the dictionary, there are total 3763 kanji. Category:Lithuanian dictionaries Category:Japanese dictionaries
title: Japanese-Lithuanian Hieroglyphs Dictionary
